axes.label: Accountability and Justice in Philippine Governance
axes.left_pole: Emphasis on international and independent legal processes for accountability, especially regarding human rights and abuse of power.
axes.right_pole: Prioritization of national sovereignty and domestic legal frameworks, challenging external intervention in governance and legal matters.

axes.label: Integrity of Information and Discourse in Political Contexts
axes.left_pole: Emphasis on factual accuracy, evidence-based arguments, and respectful dialogue, condemning misinformation and personal attacks in political discussions.
axes.right_pole: Tolerance for aggressive rhetoric, emotional appeals, and strategic information dissemination as legitimate tactics within political discourse.
